Description:
Great Four Bedroom Family Home
Enjoy the delights of this four bedroom residence with polished timber floors throughout. Comprising of formal lounge room , modern vinyl wrap kitchen with Caesar Stone benchtops including dishwasher, family room with wood heater and wall air conditioner, family bathroom, laundry , alfresco area and lock up garage including storage area on land of 580 sqm approximately.
Features include electric roller shutters, gas ducted heating , evaporative cooling, low maintenance gardens and easy access to public transport, shops and schools. Do not miss out on this fantastic opportunity!
Insights: 53 Kallay Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Bright Brick Home on a Corner Block with lots of potential seconds from the park!
In-Room Auction on Wednesday 18 Nov 2015 from 6:30pm
Address: Merrimu Receptions, 1300 Dandenong Rd, Murrumbeena
From its suitability as a dream development opportunity (STCA) to its functionality as an excellent home for the young family or investment, there's so much upside to this outstanding bright property that you'll be kicking yourself if you let this premium opportunity slip away.
For homebuyers looking to call this place home, you'll rejoice in the presence of radiant living spaces, bedrooms of large proportions, fully-tiled family bathroom and abundance of natural light. Ready to comfortably live in now, the young family will also be excited by the prospect of making the home their own by modernising the interior to suit their own tastes and style. There is also central gas ducted heating and the air-condition unit.
Enjoy peaceful dinners with the family in the intimate formal dining room, and when it's time to unwind, do so together in the comfort of the sizeable living. Size and space are also hallmarks of the well-appointed kitchen.
The walking distance access to Clayton South Primary School accentuates the home's suitability for young family living, while your children have the chance to make lifelong friendships whenever they congregate with other local kids in the area and play across the road at the local playground!
Situated on a 550sqm (approx.) corner allotment also means the opportunity is there to fulfill this home's true potential by building Townhouses, eachwith their own street frontage (STCA).
Conveniently located within moments of Clarinda Shopping Centre, bus transport, Clayton train station, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University Clayton Campus, Chadstone Shopping Centre and the Monash Freeway.

Description:
A PRISTINE & CLASSIC 4 BEDROOM HOME ON A SUBDIVIDED BLOCK
In impressive condition for its age, this classic brick veneer home offers a low maintenance lifestyle on a subdivided block just minutes away from central Clayton, buses, trains, Monash Hospital and Monash University making it equally appealing for occupiers and investors. Behind its timeless façade and neat front gardens you find a home with high ceilings, a sun filled lounge and an adjoining modern timber kitchen, granite benchtops, stainless appliances including dishwasher and meals area. Surprisingly, there are 4 bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes as well as a pristine family bathroom, additional powder room and extras including ducted heating and evaporative cooling that add another layer of comfort. Outside there's a grass free courtyard with a paved patio as well as a new and oversized double garage with remote controlled door.
Insights: 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet home in a well appointed area
Desirable location in a well appointed area, centrally located in Clayton South this spacious 4 bedroom home lies in close proximity to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, local schools (public and private), gorgeous parkland, Clayton Shopping Centre, public transport and the convenience of the freeway making the trip into the Melbourne CBD all the more easy.
A beautifully presented and well cared for home features: Formal lounge, family room, dining room, 4 spacious bedrooms and principal bathroom. Solid timber floors flow throughout living spaces, bedrooms feature carpeted floors whilst tiling in kitchen/bathroom enable ease of care. Down lights are spread throughout the home for a modern, unobtrusive feel and economical split-system cooling/heating unit ensure utilities are kept to a minimum. Other features include large glass sliding doors which lead out onto a gorgeous decked entertaining area, for lovely alfresco dining and entertaining. In addition, a fabulous large garden space is just begging to be landscaped and brought into unison with the rest of the property sure to become a families pride and joy.
With minimum of fuss and maximum space, this home is both spacious and well located for the burgeoning family whose needs are various and time is always a priority. The opportunities are endless for those who desire a challenge for the rest of us be sure to know that it is ready for you to move in and start a new chapter in a gorgeous family home.
Insights: 22 Second Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
A Modern Family Home That Loves To Entertain!
We're all a little bit smarter about design these days and expect that contemporary style to be reflected in our living spaces. A home needs to be more than just functional it should be an uplifting environment where your family can enjoy a very modern lifestyle. Which is what makes this stylishly refurbished three-bedroom property such a standout.
The zoned single-level layout with a radiant living space, central ducted heating, split-system cooling and bedrooms of generous proportions makes it ideal for a young family, while the stunning interior design engages and inspires and will make you the envy of your friends!
Hidden behind an unassuming white picket fence, the frontage's clean edges hint at the design elements inside: warm timber floors, white walls and clever lighting, smart kitchen with plenty of storage and quality stainless steel appliances and a fully-tiled family bathroom. But the best is yet to come, with two brilliant outdoor areas a stunning stainless steel gourmet bbq/outdoor kitchen set-up plus a huge, fully enclosed outdoor entertaining area granting you the freedom to play host to large gatherings any time of year.
This excellent property, which features a remote gate to the carport, is also within walking distance of Westall train station, parks and schools.
If you're therefore the type of buyer who loves to have friends and family over and a home you can be excited about, one look at this place will be enough for you to call it home!

Description:
Spacious Single-Level Living In A Convenience-Laden Location
Space, style and single-level living combine in perfect harmony to offer a stylish low maintenance home that's tailor made for downsizers, first homebuyers and astute investors.
Those looking for a passive investment opportunity will be buoyed by its updated nature and immense rental potential, while homebuyers wishing to call this place home will be impressed by its contemporary appeal and homely character.
Polished timber floorboards combine with the high ceilings and light colour scheme to produce a trendy look, while the light-filled lounge captivates with its inviting warmth and generous sense of space.
Modern kitchen enjoys plenty of space and is appointed with quality stainless steel appliances, while an easy-care courtyard is the epitome of low maintenance living and will play the perfect host during social BBQs among friends and family.
Both bedrooms are of generous proportions and fitted with built-in robes, while a stylish bathroom and split-system heating and cooling adds further appeal.
Conveniently located within moments of Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, Clayton train station, parks, local schools and Clarinda Shopping Centre.

Description:
Primary School, Kindergarten and Park in the Same Street!
Good opportunity for young families to settle in a convenient area that will have no more morning school rush for young Mum's and Dad's!
Gorgeous 3 bedroom family home ideally located with a few steps away from Kindergarten, Clayton South Primary School and a park all in the same street, is this comfortable home that is all a young family will need.
Comprises: light filled lounge, formal dining, modern kitchen with meals area, separate laundry, 3 good sized bedrooms with BIR's and newish bathroom. It's further extended by an undercover outdoor entertaining area with a spacious garden.
Additional features; polished floor boards, wall heater, ceiling fans and an enclosed secure single car accommodation.
It's a home, sweet home for young families to enjoy with the comfort of security as well.
Insights: 5 Narrumburn Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
The Next Growth Pocket. Buy Now Before it's too Late!
Want all the convenience and benefits of living in Clayton Central....but don't want to pay $1 000 000........???? Well this property will offer all that and more......but for so much less.
In a highly desirable and in demand pocket of Clayton South, Newport Rd is one of the hottest street right now!! Buy now before it's too late....with some sales already reaching the magic million (Frank Ave).
A family friendly location, with beautiful streetscape, minutes to Clayton Central and all of its fantastic amenities and with Costco Moorabbin only minutes away. So you can understand why buyers are clamouring to buy in this area.
Special Features
Location, location, location, location...
Wide frontage, possible side by side build (STCA) or build your dream home
3 bedrooms, original weatherboard
Walk to Clayton Shops or catch the bus from Clayton Rd
Family Friendly Location, with Namatjira Park at the end of the street and local schools within walking distance
Land size 16.4m X 37m (600m2 approx.)
But really ....it's all about the LOCATION !!!!!!!!!!!!!

Description:
A QUALITY AND SPACIOUS HOME WITH LOADS OF ROOM FOR FAMILY GET TOGETHER
Perfectly positioned in a quiet cul-de-sac, backed by Spring Valley Golf Club, this fabulous home has been kept in great condition by long term owners. On a generous block (approx. 680m2) the home features polished hardwood floors throughout, a formal lounge/dining room with vaulted ceilings, a renovated kitchen with tiled meals area, separate laundry and a family room with 7.1 theater wired speakers. There are 3 robed bedrooms including the master with a walk in wardrobe and a full ensuite to complement the updated central bathroom. Ducted heating and 4 air conditioners allow for tailored climate control while outside, within the security of a remote controlled gate, you find a single carport, a double garage, Stratco covered patio for alfresco entertaining that overlooks the rear yard with automated irrigation vegie patch, green house and water tank. Located within minutes of buses, primary and secondary schools, Monash University, Haileybury college and Westall train station.
Insights: 26 Bellavista Crescent, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
304SQM! NO SHARED LAND
Wonderfully contemporary with its own street presence, the comfortable easy-care spaces of this Near brand new (less than 7 months old) 27sq near new, 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom town residence are perfectly matched to a relaxing low-maintenance lifestyle. Flawlessly appointed over 2 levels, the generous proportions and pleasing presentation provide the ideal scenario for professionals, investors or young families. Polished timber floors and central courtgarden light-well reflect brilliant natural light throughout the impressive interior that features an over-sized, open plan living/dining zone incorporating a modern Stone kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances. An upper level retreat and private courtyard add to abundant accommodation, further enhanced by GDH, split system AC, alarm and SLUG. Offering attractive proximity to Keeley Reserve, train station, schools, Clayton shops and Monash University and Medical Centre.

Description:
Owner Relocating! Inspection A Must!
This spacious, 20 square, 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom family home offers quality lifestyle within close proximity to all amenities. Conveniently located on the border of Clayton, Oakleigh South and Clarinda.
This architecturally designed townhouse with top quality fixtures and fittings will amaze even the fussiest buyers. The home is only 2 months old, thus the 7 year builder guarantee is still in place.
Downstairs you will find huge open plan living and dining overlooking landscaped back yard, designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and stone bench tops, European style laundry, powder room, large double remote garage with internal access for your convenience.
The staircase will lead you to perfectly positioned 3 large bedrooms with built in robes. Master bedroom with full ensuite and walk-in robe. Extra large family bathroom complemented by a double shower and bathtub.
This property is also fully equipped in all luxuries including powerful ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, alarm system, water tank connected to toilets and garden shed. All this at the doorstep of good schools, shopping centres, Bald Hill Park, Libraries, Aquatic Centre, and only minutes away from busy Clayton Shopping strip, train station, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University.
For more information call Rene on 0413 330 357

Superbly sited on a deep allotment with a great future lying ahead, explore every exciting option when determining the destiny of this original 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home. Desirable dimensions of 695m2 (approx) surround this original abode, that's ready for willing renovators to rejuvenate, astute builders to create a new style standard or developers to subdivide and reap the rich rewards (STCA). Currently offering traditional living/dining domain, timber kitchen with adjoining meals area, shed and SLUG plus workshop. Occupy or lease out whilst contemplating its future, walking distance to Clayton shops, Clayton and Westall train stations and a short drive to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre and Chadstone Shopping Centre.
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL ENQUIRIES

Description:
RENOVATED HOME IN THIS UNCOMPROMISED LOCATION
A delightful property in this very quiet and very convenient street. Nested in this desirable and popular pocket of Clarinda. An appealing and spacious home close to Namatjira Reserve, Bald Hill Park, St Andrews Primary and the Clayton Community Centre and swimming pool. This refreshing home has 3 bedrooms with BIR, wide entrance hallway, separate lounge and dining area with polished timber floors, new kitchen with gloss cupboards and stone bench tops, gas stove, dishwasher and adjoining meals area. Renovated bathroom with quality tiles, separate bath and shower, large laundry with access to carport. Pleasant gardens ideal for entertainers. ID and contact details required before inspection.
Terms 10% Deposit. Balance 30/60 days.
Insights: 33B Springs Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2015 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
3 Units On 1 Block Equals Rich Investment Rewards
The perfect union of position and possession of the entire block is music to the ears of eager investors as these 3 single level units are offered together on their own titles. A strategic addition to a successful property portfolio with low upkeep and high returns; each immaculate unit is well appointed with spacious living, kitchen/meals, 2 bedrooms, bathroom, private terrace and covered car accommodation. Take full advantage of this outstanding all-in-one opportunity and reap the huge investment benefits, with each unit currently tenanted with an excellent return. Situated in a high-growth suburb, moments to Westall station, Westall Primary and Secondary and a short bus ride to Monash University.
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL ENQUIRIES

Description:
Spacious and stylish in convenient location * Private sale by closing date at 5.30pm on Mon 12/10/15 * OFI by appointment
Showcasing a free-flowing and functional floor plan, this superb 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment is moments from Westall train station, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University. Framed by floor-to-ceiling glass, enjoy open-plan living and dining, a gourmet kitchen with Bosch appliances and a luxury bathroom with European laundry. The home's standout feature is a supersized balcony purpose-built to entertain large gatherings. Easy to love, exceptional to live in and effortless to rent out, this is one inspection sure to impress.
* 2 large bedrooms with mirrored BIRs, main featuring en suite
* Spacious open-plan living and dining
* Gourmet kitchen with Bosch appliances and Caesarstone benchtops
* Supersized balcony with urban views
* Luxury bathroom with oversized shower and European laundry
* Handy study alcove
* Secure basement car parking and storage cage
* Split-system heating and cooling
* Intercom entry and CCTV security
* Close to Westall Station, Westall Secondary College, Monash University, Monash Medical Centre
* Private sale by closing date at 5.30pm on Mon 12/10/15
* OFI by appointment
Insights: 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Brilliant Debut Or Investment Option In Prime Locale
A location offering the ultimate lifestyle convenience moments to Clayton station, Monash University, Clayton shopping precinct and Monash Medical Centre complements the entry level appeal or investment attractiveness of this exceptional dual-level townhouse. With its own street presence, this outstanding home exemplifies private & stress-free living, with a spacious lounge flowing through to a modern kitchen/meals (Bosch dishwasher) with gas cooking & low-maintenance courtyard with synthetic turf. 3 bedrooms, including main with access to a 2-way bathroom and 2nd toilet, is complemented by GDH, split system AC, satellite dish, alarm system, intercom & auto SLUG with own driveway maximising owner-occupier comfort or improving rental returns if desired.
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL ENQUIRIES
